column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went on a very busy Friday Afternoon and had about a 20 minute wait. However that was great as they had a smooth process where you preorder your pizza and by the time you sat down you had salad
column2: appetizer and pizza almost boom boom boom ready. Our waiter was awesome and very patient with all our questions and requests for more and more food. It was delicious and I can't wait to go back!!
